official_title: A bill to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to require defense contractors to conduct job training programs.

summary.text: Amends the Defense Production Act of 1950 to prohibit the Secretary of Defense from entering any defense contract in excess of $5,000,000 with any manufacturer in the United States unless such manufacturer agrees to sponsor or conduct job training programs in skills which are in short supply.
